verses.text: In \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*: his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 76.1 \ft chief…: or, overseer\f*\f + \fr 76.1 \ft of: or, for\f*
In \w Salem|strong="H8004"\w* also is his \w tabernacle|strong="H5520"\w*, and his dwelling \w place|strong="H4585"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

There \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* he the \w arrows|strong="H7565"\w* of the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, the \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*, and the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
Thou \add art\add* more \w glorious|strong="H0215"\w* \add and\add* \w excellent|strong="H0117"\w* than the \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* of \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*.

The \w stouthearted|strong="H0047"\w* are \w spoiled|strong="H7997"\w*, they have \w slept|strong="H5123"\w* their \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*: and none of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w might|strong="H2428"\w* have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

At thy \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, both the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* are cast into a dead \w sleep|strong="H7290"\w*.

Thou, \add even\add* thou, \add art\add* to be \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*: and who may \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H0227"\w* once thou art \w angry|strong="H0639"\w*?

Thou didst cause \w judgment|strong="H1779"\w* to be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, and was \w still|strong="H8252"\w*,

When \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* to \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* all the \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

Surely the \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee: the \w remainder|strong="H7611"\w* of \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* shalt thou \w restrain|strong="H2296"\w*.

\w Vow|strong="H5087"\w*, and \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: let all that be round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him \w bring|strong="H2986"\w* \w presents|strong="H7862"\w* unto him that ought to be \w feared|strong="H4172"\w*.\f + \fr 76.11 \ft unto him…: Heb. to fear\f*

He shall cut \w off|strong="H1219"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w princes|strong="H5057"\w*: \add he is\add* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* to the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
